distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the New Year’s Resolutions in 2021 and 2022 dataset

distribution.name: nyr_data.csv
distribution.description: The sanitized responses to the survey as detailed in the description.

field.name: State
field.description: The respondent's state as a two-letter USPS abbreviation

field.name: Had 2021
field.description: Whether the respondent had a New Year's resolution for 2021

field.name: 2021 category
field.description: The category of the respondent's 2021 New Year's resolution

field.name: Accomplished 2021
field.description: How well the respondent accomplished their 2021 New Year's resolution on a scale of 1 to 5

field.name: Have 2022
field.description: Whether the respondent has a New Year's resolution for 2022

field.name: 2022 category
field.description: The category of the respondent's 2022 New Year's resolution

field.name: Expecting to accomplish 2022
field.description: How well the respondent is expecting to accomplish their 2022 New Year's resolution on a scale of 1 to 5

field.name: Expecting to fail 2022
field.description: Whether the respondent expects to fail their 2022 New Year's resolution

field.name: Generation
field.description: The generation of the respondent, as determined by their year of birth

recordSet.name: nyr_data.csv
recordSet.description: The sanitized responses to the survey as detailed in the description.

keywords: subject > people and society > people > holidays and cultural events
name: New Year’s Resolutions in 2021 and 2022
description:
[![Made by Statistry](https://statistry.bsoyka.me/img/badge.png)](https://statistry.bsoyka.me/?utm_source=dataset_description&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=nyr_202122)

### Context

This data was gathered with a public survey asking respondents questions about their New Year's resolutions (if any) in 2021 and 2022.

### Content

Each row represents one response to the survey. Each column represents one question, with more details given in the column description on Kaggle.

### Acknowledgements

A special thanks to the following people:
- Every single person who has responded to the survey with valid answers for making this entire dataset possible
